item.title: Dungeon cape emote help
item.dc:creator: @pastaway pastaway
item.description:
@pastaway wrote:

where do i add this in my server for the dungeoneering cape emote?

[QUOTE] public void dungemote(final Client c) {
EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
int dungtime = 16;
public void execute(EventContainer dung) {
switch (dungtime) {
case 16:
c.gfx0(2442);
c.startAnimation(13190);
case 15:
c.npcId2 = 11228;
c.isNpc = true;
c.startAnimation(13192);
case 10:
c.npcId2 = 11227;
c.isNpc = true;
c.startAnimation(13193);
case 6:
c.gfx0(2442);
case 5:
c.npcId2 = 11229;
c.startAnimation(13194);
case 0:
c.isNpc = false;
if (c == null || dungtime <= 0) {
dung.stop();
}
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
dungtimeâ€“;
}
}, 600);
}[/QUOTE]
i need it so that when u click the skillcape icon when wearing the dungeoneering cape you do that emote

Read full topic
